price: তুমি সিহঁতৰ বাবে দুখ নকৰিবা আৰু সিহঁতৰ ষড়যন্ত্ৰতো মনঃক্ষুণ্ণও নহ’বা।
arabic: وَلَا تَحۡزَنۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا تَكُن فِي ضَيۡقٖ مِّمَّا يَمۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: walā taḥzan ʿalayhim walā takun fī ḍayqin mimmā yamkurūna
